item.title: Melanie add a quote by Chuck Klosterman
item.description: "Every relationship is fundamentally a power struggle, and the individual in power is whoever likes the other person less." -- Chuck Klosterman

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Chuck Klosterman
item.description: "Art and love are the same thing: Itâ€™s the process of seeing yourself in things that are not you." -- Chuck Klosterman

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Augusten Burroughs
item.description: "I hate feelings. Why does sobriety have to come with feelings?" -- Augusten Burroughs

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Steffan Piper
item.description: "No one will ever love you as much as you want them to." -- Steffan Piper

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Dean Koontz
item.description: "Humanity is a parade of fools, and I am at the front of it, twirling a baton." -- Dean Koontz

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Dean Koontz
item.description: "Human beings can always be relied upon to exert, with vigor, their God-given right to be stupid. " -- Dean Koontz

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Frank Portman
item.description: "Normal: lacking in taste, compassion, understanding, kindness, and ordinary human decency." -- Frank Portman

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Frank Portman
item.description: "I was starting to realize the extent of the problem here: everyone is always lying to each other, and even when they're trying to tell the truth, it can still be misleading or wrong. In fact, it almost always is wrong from at least one angle. I mean, the truth is really just a better class of lie." -- Frank Portman

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Mark Haddon
item.description: "And it occurred to him that there were two parts to being a better person. One part was thinking about other people. The other part was not giving a toss what other people thought." -- Mark Haddon

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Mark Haddon
item.description: "All the other children at my school are stupid. Except I'm not meant to call them stupid, even though this is what they are." -- Mark Haddon

item.title: Melanie add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "Listen to the mustn'ts, child. Listen to the don'ts. Listen to the shouldn'ts, the impossibles, the won'ts. Listen to the never haves, then listen close to me... Anything can happen, child. Anything can be." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Melanie add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Of course it is happening inside your head, Harry, but why on earth should that mean that it is not real?" -- J.K. Rowling
